hex_ars_link.page.linkers.0: These items convert player's Ars Nouveau $(thing)Mana/$ into Hex Casting $(media)media/$. When holding in hand, right click to bind personal mana bar to it, and crouch + right click to unbind.$(br)After binded, it acts like a $(item)Phial of Media$(), and directly drains player's mana when extracting media out. Better linker item has higher conversion ratio.
hex_ars_link.page.linkers.1: A $(l:hex_ars_link:linkers#lv1)$(item)Lesser Mana Linker/$ converts every $(bold)10/$ mana point to $(item)1 amethyst dust/$ amount of media. $(br)An $(l:hex_ars_link:linkers#lv2)$(item)Advanced Mana Linker/$ converts every $(bold)1/$ mana point to $(item)1 amethyst dust/$ amount of media. $(br)A $(l:hex_ars_link:linkers#lv3)$(item)Great Mana Linker/$ converts every $(bold)1/$ mana point to $(item)1 amethyst shard/$ amount of media.
